name: Pather
description:
Pather is a great maze game for enjoying and testing brain capability!

This game has 4 types of modes:-

1; Classic- A classic mode with basic mechanics.

2; Night- A spooky mode with higher difficulty which darkness and moths make it harder to reach your goal.

3; Dark- A hard mode which is very dark that makes it even harder to move.

4; Timer- The best mode to test your brain and body speed by breaking your high score in a certain amount of time.

There are more upcoming games that you might like playing, so in order to publish them we need you to donate us (that would be very helpful).
